string.text: 생명 보조 시스템 프로토타입
This package contains an integrated system that monitors the wearer's health and supplies vitamins, adrenalin or anabolic substances as required.\n \n
상처 치료 시스템 프로토타입
This package contains a medical device designed for continuous administration of medicines in the field.\n \n
강화된 방탄용 안감
This package contains various types of kevlar, titanium, beryl, aluminium and carbon fibre plates and matrices. Featuring high viscosity and excellent stopping action.\n \n
보조 장갑판
This package contains specially crafted armoured plates of different materials, slightly increasing bullet resistance.\n \n
견고한 장갑판과 옷감
This package contains durable armour plates of titanium and aluminium alloy for heavy equipment, and polymeric inserts for lighter outfits.\n \n
플라스틱 및 합성 부품
This package contains synthetic and plastic parts from various armoured suits, designed to reduce the weight of armour and increase mobility and endurance.\n \n
화학적 방화 소재와 안감

This package contains a set of hazardous fabrics and materials which can improve the protective performance of suits of armour against chemical effects. They can interrupt the chemical reaction in the gas phase of combustion, while some contain chemicals that cause swelling up behind the protective layer, providing even more insulation.\n \n
방화 옷감 및 안감

This package contains a set of protective fabrics and materials with unqiue properties to slow or stop the spread of fire or reduce its intensity. Some are fireproof materials containing magnesium elements of varying length, width, thickness and shape.\n \n
절연용 직물 및 안감
This package contains a set of protective constantan, magnesium and silicone inserts, designed to reduce the impact of electrical charges on armour.\n \n
보호 코팅된 피복
This package contains a set of screening inserts and aluminized layers for helmets and armoured suits, with radio-repellent rubber to slightly reducing the effects of psy-influences.\n \n
활성 필터와 방사능 방호 소재

A set of protective filters, preventing the entry of various poisons and chemicals into the body through respiratory systems. In addition of high-density materials to reduce the intensity of alpha and gamma particles.\n \n
무게 분산용 고정 시스템
This package contains a set of various fasteners for load distribution.\n \n
부착물 고정용 물품
This package contains a suit belt attachment to increase the number of simultaneously usable modules and artefact containers.\n \n
유압식 서보 드라이브 증폭 시스템
This package contains enhanced prototypical servo drives for first and second generation exoskeletons, allowing the user to sprint.\n \n
경량화 소재
This package contains a set of lightweight polymeric materials of varying length, width, thickness and shape, as well as various properties.\n \n
이동형 역가중 부품

This package contains a set of lightweight polymer components for various types of weapons. The fashion for polymer components has not only paid off, but it has also become quite a popular upgrade.\n \n
총열 외부 나사깎기용 부품
This package contains a set of external threading components for various types of weapons. External threading allows a silencer to be installed.\n \n
총열 하단 유탄발사기 거치대
This package contains a set of external underbarrel grenade launcher mounts for various types of weapons.\n \n
자동 가스 조절기
This package contains a set of special regulator mechanism for various types of weapons. It protects the weapon from dirt.\n \n
총열 추가 나사모양 홈

This package contains a set of additional threaded canals for various types of weapons. Installation of a barrel with additional threaded canals improves bullet speed and weapon accuracy at the cost of a considerable increase in recoil.\n \n
추가 가스 피스톤
This package contains a set of additional gas pistons for various types of weapons. A second piston moves the counter-weight, compensating for the bolt mechanism movement impulse.\n \n
대용량 탄창 세트
This package contains a set of magazines for various types of weapons with higher capacity for calibres.\n \n
광학식 조준기 거치대 세트
This package contains a set of optical scopes for various types of weapons. Mounting includes scopes for close, medium and long range combat.\n \n
균형유지 부품
This package contains a set of balancing elements for various types of weapons. Synthetic elements installed onto rods ensures that they move strictly as intended, increasing accuracy.\n \n
구경 전환 부품 세트

This package contains a set of calibre components for various types of weapons. A complex, integrated alteration of the weapon's mechanical and automated parts, which allows its calibre to be changed at the cost of reliability.\n \n
다양한 모양의 인체공학적 총몸

This package contains a set of ergonomic receiver for various types of weapons. A modification used exclusively for barrels with solid bullpup receivers, which simplifies maintenance of the weapon.\n \n
티타늄 복귀 메커니즘 막대
This package contains a set of titanium rods for various types of weapons. Titanium rods can endure a much higher rate of fire than regular rods.\n \n
광학식 조준경 거치대 세트
This package contains a set of optical mounts for various types of weapons. Allowing installation of a mount for attachment of an optical scope.\n \n
방아쇠 기계장치 세트
This package contains a set of trigger mechanism for various types of weapons. Improvement of the weapon's automatic parts suitable for different burst and automated fire modes.\n \n
